post: Thanks blue. Now, about your helpful response:  it's *you're = YOU ARE welcome.  It's not *your.  *Your implies possession e.g. YOUR misspelling will be YOUR doom! ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha haThat's the least I can do for you, buddy.  I forgot how to find my ratings also.  I'm perfect so far! Yay
Thanks blue. Appreciate the timely response!
